sentences: Pärast linnusesse asumist seati kohe ammumeestest vahid üles müüridele.
Tulisel hool kihutas põder .., kuid veelgi vihasema hooga ammumees tema taga.
context: The word 'vahid' is the nominative plural form of 'vaht' in Estonian, meaning guards or sentinels. It refers to people who stand watch or protect a location, as seen in historical contexts where armed guards were positioned on castle walls.
